title: Multiples of 3
text:
There are N numbers a[0], a[1] ... a[N - 1]. Initially all are 0. You have to perform two types of operations :Increase the numbers between indices A and B (inclusive) by 1. This is represented by the command "0 A B"Answer how many numbers between indices A and B (inclusive) are divisible by 3. This is represented by the command "1 A B".InputThe first line contains two integers, N and Q.
Each of the next Q lines are either of the form "0 A B" or "1 A B" as mentioned above.OutputOutput 1 line for each of the queries of the form "1 A B" containing the required answer for the corresponding query.SampleInput:4 7
1 0 3
0 1 2
0 1 3
1 0 0
0 0 3
1 3 3
1 0 3Output:4
1
0
2Constraints1 ≤ N ≤ 1000001 ≤ Q ≤ 1000000 ≤ A ≤ B ≤ N - 1
